contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Director General of the International Atomic Energy Agency Visits Qatar Foundation and Explores Possible Collaborations

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Qatar Foundation (QF) hosted His Excellency the Director General of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) Yukiya Amano during a visit to Qatar.

The Head of the Vienna-based intergovernmental organization and his delegation were welcomed to Qatar Foundation Visitor’s Centre by Engineer Jassim Telefat, Group Executive Director of Qatar Foundation Capital Projects and Facilities Management.

H.E. the Director General was then introduced to QF through a comprehensive presentation that detailed the many educational initiatives, community development plans and scientific research programs being undertaken by the Foundation and its many centers.

Following the presentation, the delegation was shown an impressive 3D scale model of the educational and research buildings, in addition to future construction projects at Qatar Foundation.

The visit concluded with H.E. the Director General and his delegation visiting the headquarters of Qatar Foundation Research and Development’s Qatar Science & Technology Park (QSTP).

For the full story, please click here.
